name: Recreation Printing
overview:
Inaugurated in the year 2005, we, “Recreation Printing Technology Pvt. Ltd.”, are recognized among the affluent manufacturer and supplier of a qualitative assortment of Corrugated and Laminated Boxes. In our wide array, we offer superior quality Laminated Boxes, Corrugated Boxes, Duplex Boxes, Imported Boxes, Printed Stickers, Laminated Rolls, etc.

Our Team: With a team of highly experienced and knowledgeable professionals, we have been able to manufacture and supply superior quality products. Every team member is passionate about delivering the best quality products to our valuable clients that are spread all across the country. Our professionals work in harmony in order to carry out smooth business operation.

Our Clientele: Sap Sir Fone AKASAKI ALLIANCE TOSHI Power AIRTEL AHLAM”s Life Vip

Client Satisfaction: Being a highly reliable manufacturer of Laminated corrugated boxes for mobile charger industry and designing & printing services of these boxes, we give paramount emphasis on clients specifications, preferences & requirements.

Why Us?: Owing to our years of experience and extensive market understanding, we have carved an outstanding niche in the industry. These are well-known among clients for their high quality, optimum strength, durability and ability to carry heavy weight.
